info.title: Infoblox THREATINSIGHT API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI THREATINSIGHT objects

get.description: Returns a list of threatinsight:allowlist objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific threatinsight:allowlist object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific threatinsight:allowlist object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific threatinsight:allowlist object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of threatinsight:cloudclient objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific threatinsight:cloudclient object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific threatinsight:cloudclient object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of threatinsight:insight_allowlist objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific threatinsight:insight_allowlist object by reference
Returns a list of threatinsight:moduleset objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific threatinsight:moduleset object by reference

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

Method.name: _method
Method.description: Enter the method type for the request

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

comment.description: The descriptive comment for the threat insight allowlist.

disable.description: Determines whether the threat insight allowlist is disabled.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the threat insight allowlist.

type.description: The type of the threat insight allowlist.

blacklist_rpz_list.description: The RPZs to which you apply newly detected domains through the Infoblox Threat Insight Cloud Client.

enable.description: Determines whether the Threat Insight in Cloud Client is enabled.

force_refresh.description: Force a refresh if at least one RPZ is configured.

interval.description: The time interval (in seconds) for requesting newly detected domains by the Infoblox Threat Insight Cloud Client and applying them to the list of configured RPZs.
